招致委員会: (しょうちいいんかい) - bid committee
招集: (しょうしゅう) - calling or convening (a meeting, assembly, congress)
招魂: (しょうこん) - invocation of the dead
拝: (olá/oi) - worship , bowing one's head (in respect or worship), worship; respectfully yours
拝す: (はいす) - to bow/to worship; to receive; to see
拝する: (はいする) - to bow/to worship; to receive; to see
拝み倒す: (おがみたおす) - to persuade someone to consent; to entreat repeatedly; to beg; to implore
拝み箸: (おがみばし) - clasping your chopsticks between your hands as in a gesture of prayer (a breach of etiquette)
拝む: (おがむ) - to assume the posture of praying/to press the palms and fingers of both hands together/to do reverence (e.g. before a statue of the Buddha)/to pay one's respects; to beg/to make a supplication; (sometimes used sarcastically in modern Japanese) to see (something or someone of high status)
拝具: (はいぐ) - (term used in closing a letter) respectfully yours
拝呈: (はいてい) - presenting/presentation; (salutation of a formal letter) Dear (so and so)/Dear Sir/Dear Madam/To Whom It May Concern
拝命: (はいめい) - receiving an official appointment
拝啓: (はいけい) - (letters beginning with this typically end with 敬具) Dear (so and so); Dear Sir; Dear Madam; To Whom It May Concern
拝察: (はいさつ) - surmise; infer; sympathize; sympathise
拝復: (はいふく) - (salutation of a formal letter of response) Dear Sir or Madam, in reply to your letter ...
拝所: (うがんじゅ) - place of worship (in Okinawa)
拝承: (はいしょう) - hearing; understanding; learning; being informed
拝殿: (はいでん) - front shrine; hall of worship
拝眉: (はいび) - having the pleasure of seeing (a person)
拝謁: (haietsu) - having an audience with someone of very high social standing (por exemplo, o imperador)
拝趨: (はいすう) - to visit someone; to call on
拝金主義の固まり: (はいきんしゅぎのかたまり) - money-worshiper
拝金主義の塊: (はいきんしゅぎのかたまり) - money-worshiper
拝金主義者: (はいきんしゅぎしゃ) - mammonist; money-worshipper
拝領: (はいりょう) - receiving (from a superior); bestowed
拝顔の栄: (はいがんのえい) - honor of seeing (a person); honour of seeing (a person)
拠ない: (よんどころない) - can't be helped (of situation, reason, etc.); unavoidable
拠りどころ: (よりどころ) - grounds/foundation/authority; support/prop/something upon which to rely
拠り所: (よりどころ) - grounds/foundation/authority; support/prop/something upon which to rely
拠る: (よる) - (esp. 依る;拠る) to be due to/to be caused by; (esp. 依る) to depend on/to turn on; (esp. 因る;由る) to be based on/to come from
拠ん所ない: (よんどころない) - can't be helped (of situation, reason, etc.); unavoidable
拠ん所無い: (よんどころない) - can't be helped (of situation, reason, etc.); unavoidable
拠出金: (きょしゅつきん) - donated money; monetary donation; contribution
拠所: (よりどころ) - grounds/foundation/authority; support/prop/something upon which to rely
拠所ない: (よんどころない) - can't be helped (of situation, reason, etc.); unavoidable
拠点とする: (きょてんとする) - to be based in (a place)
拠点に置く: (きょてんにおく) - to be based in (a place)
拠点空港: (きょてんくうこう) - hub airport
拠無い: (よんどころない) - can't be helped (of situation, reason, etc.); unavoidable
拡がり: (ひろがり) - spread; span; expanse; extent
拡がる: (ひろがる) - to spread (out); to extend; to stretch; to reach to; to get around; to fill (e.g. a space)
拡げる: (ひろげる) - (広げる, 拡げる only) to spread/to extend/to expand/to enlarge/to widen/to broaden; to unfold/to open/to unroll/to unwrap; (広げる, 拡げる only) to scatter about/to spread around; (広げる, 拡げる only) to make flourish/to cause to prosper
拡声装置: (かくせいそうち) - public-address system; PA system
拡声設備: (かくせいせつび) - loudspeaker system; PA system
拡大保証: (かくだいほしょう) - extended warranty
拡大再生産: (かくだいさいせいさん) - reproduction on an enlarged or expanded scale
拡大均衡: (かくだいきんこう) - an expanded or expanding equilibrium
拡大推計: (かくだいすいけい) - extrapolation; projection
拡大率: (かくだいりつ) - rate of magnification; magnification power
拡大管: (かくだいかん) - expanding pipe; diffuser; expander; reducer
拡大縮小: (かくだいしゅくしょう) - scaling; zooming
拡大行列: (かくだいぎょうれつ) - augmented matrix
拡大解釈: (かくだいかいしゃく) - (yoji) broad interpretation
拡大販売: (かくだいはんばい) - sales promotion
拡大路線: (かくだいろせん) - (yoji) expansion policy; road to expansion
拡大連座制: (かくだいれんざせい) - expanded system of guilt by association in Japanese election law, which stipulates that an elected official may lose his position if someone in his campaign commits a crime
拡大鏡: (かくだいきょう) - magnifying glass; loupe
拡幅: (かくふく) - widening (of a road); to widen (esp. a road)
拡張スロット: (かくちょうスロット) - expansion slot; expansion board slot
拡張テキスト: (かくちょうテキスト) - extended text
拡張パック: (かくちょうパック) - expansion pack (game)
拡張ボード: (かくちょうボード) - expansion board
